title: Stuck at 99%, then crash
body:
So I've queued for several games of ranked/normals/aram, and every 3-5 games there's an issue where I load in, get to 95-99 percent, wait there for a minute, and then just suddenly disconnect. No message or anything pops up, and the client will be frozen for roughly a minute, which is just enough time for the team to vote to remake. Coupled with the actual disconnect bug that's been going around, I've been given a leaverbuster. Is anyone else experiencing this problem? I've tried restarting, using the hextech repair tool, and the client settings option to check files, but nothing's come up. 

Thanks.

replies.body: Are your drivers up to date?  It sounds like something isn't successfully rendering the game, so it's crashing out.  Check out the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot, which include updating drivers as well as game files.  That should do the trick!
